ARTICLES.author: USER_ID_REPLACE
ARTICLES.title: Welcome to ngDesk!
ARTICLES.body:
Welcome to ngDesk!

You can now create categories, sections, and articles for your company. Check out other articles or create your own with access control options that can be customizable! 

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us!

 

Thanks!

the ngDesk team

ARTICLES.author: USER_ID_REPLACE
ARTICLES.title: What are categories, sections, and articles?
ARTICLES.body:
This FAQ is a section in the General category of your ngDesk Guide knowledge base. We created this category and a few common sections to help you get started with your guide.

The knowledge base in the guide consists of three main document types: category, section, and article.

You can add your own content and modify or completely delete our content. See our ngDesk documentation or reach out to a ngDesk support team member to learn how.
